name: Shooty Ping Pong
description:
Shooty ping pong is here!

The hip game that noone everyone is talking about!

You just like shoot yourself and stuff. Ezy

INCLUDES:

  • One *original* soundtrack which is not very good;
  • 2 player local compepetive multiplayer!
  • Pixel art black and white graphics!
  • *Sound effects*
  • Minimalistic artstle!
  • And most importantly...

ITS FREE!

Play now or something
